text: Ani jaba hamile unako mrtyuko nimti adesa diyaum ta ti jinnaharula'i usako mrtyuko samacara kasaile di'ena ghunakira baheka jasale usako laththila'i kha'irakheko thiyo. Ani jaba uni khasihale, taba jinnaharule thaha pa'e ki yadi uni paroksaka kura jannevala bha'eko bha'e yasa apamanajanaka yatanama parirakhne thi'enan
